title: Strings
text:
Strings
Below are the strings we currently have in stock. If the string you want is not listed, feel free to contact us and we will do our best to make it available. Customers are also free to bring their own string.

SOLINCO HYPER G (16 GAUGE) – $16
Solinco Hyper-G is a shaped co-poly with an impressive combination of spin and precision. Developed for an ATP top 50 player, this medium firm string will allow big hitters to take massive cuts at the ball without having to worry about overhitting. Topspin players who like hitting balls that dive sharply and explode off the court should love this string.






 



POWER:                
COMFORT:           
SPIN:                      
CONTROL:               
DURABLILITY:      





BIG HITTER BLACK 7 (16 GUAGE) – $12
Big Hitter Black 7 is not only a great option for advanced players in search of a durable poly with major bite and power, but it also looks like a great starting point for big swinging intermediates who are ready to take the poly plunge.






 



POWER:                
COMFORT:         
SPIN:

OEHMS BLACK PEARL ROUGH (1.21mm) – $11
Shaped co-polyester tennis string of latest technology, high-tech made in Germany. Eight internal grooves create additional spin and lead to a longer ball pocketing. The result is pure spin and control. Perfect for athletic players who like hitting with heavy spin.

OEHMS MATADOR (1.19mm) – $11
A softer comfortable eight-sided co-poly string for extra ball bite and spin.






 



POWER:

RPM Blast (16 GUAGE) – $21
One of the most iconic co-polys of all time, this firm and durable string is perfect for big hitters looking to load the ball with pace and spin. The slick surface of RPM Blast enables the strings to snap back with vicious force, resulting in extra RPMs (think heavy ball). It also seems to be working quite well for Rafa! Did we mention the spin?






 



POWER:                
COMFORT:           
SPIN:                       
CONTROL:              
DURABLILITY:       





Volkyl Cyclone (17 GUAGE) – $11
A unique string offering incredible spin with surprising playability. The multi-sided shape features significant ridges, which help to really bite the ball and result in the ability to generate tremendous amounts of spin. This string offers enhanced ball speed, improved control, and most importantly, incredible spin as compared to typical polyester strings. Volkyl Cyclone is comparable to RPM Blast, but much more affordable.

KIRSCHBAUM ORANGE (1.28mm) – $10
Kirschbaum Orange is a monofilament polyester string which is a great performance string for the price. It combines power, control and extreme durability

PRINCE TOUR XTRA POWER (17 GUAGE) – $10
This co-poly gives strong intermediates and advanced players phenomenal control on full swings. Made with a unique alloy to improve feel and tension maintenance, Tour XP manages to offer sufficient comfort without sacrificing the crisp feel and firm feedback that many advanced players crave.

YONEX DYNAWIRE ALL AROUND (17 GAUGE) - $10
Yonex Dynawire Tennis String uses a solid core construction for a crisp feel and durable response. The string also incorporates a unique metal film around it for a boost in power, and silicone coating to help the strings slide easily.

title: Chris Tennis Stringing
text:
Chris Tennis Stringing provides quality tennis stringing services at an affordable price. With a quick turnaround, you can expect your racket returned within 1-2 days.
See the About Section for more details relating to cost and location. See the Strings Section for a list of strings we currently have in stock.

title: Chris Tennis Stringing
text:
About
Chris Tennis Stringing provides quality tennis stringing services at an affordable price. With a quick turnaround, you can expect your racket returned within 1-2 days.

title: Chris Tennis Stringing
text:
Cost
$15 per racket + cost of string
Deal: String 4 rackets, Get the 5th free!

title: Chris Tennis Stringing
text:
Location
We are located near Maceys on 800N in Orem, Utah. Please contact us for the exact address.

title: Extra Products
text:
Extra Products
Below are extra products available for purchase. Some items come free when stringing a racket.

BASIC OVERGRIP – $2 (*FREE)
A soft, padded, cloth-like tape that is wrapped around the handle of a racquet. Three different types are available (see the red grips in the picture).

Padded
Padded with Holes
Basic

*Free upon request on rackets that are restrung.






 





WILSON OVERGRIP – $3
A soft, padded, cloth-like tape that is wrapped around the handle of a racquet. (higher quality)






 





Shock Absorber – $3 (*FREE)
The purpose of a vibration dampener is to reduce the shock during contact caused by the tennis ball hitting the racquet strings.
*Free upon request on rackets that are restrung.






 





TOURNA RACQUET GUARD TAPE – $3 (*FREE)
Abrasion tape that protects rackets from nicks and scrapes.
*Free upon request on rackets that are restrung.






 





TOURNA REPLACEMENT GRIP – $10
The replacement grip (also known as the stock grip, base grip, factory grip, undergrip, etc), is the grip that goes onto the racquet’s bare wooden handle itself. It’s usually a bit thicker, to allow for some cushioning.






 





REPLACEMENT GROMMETS & HEAD GUARD – ~$30
The grommets are the little plastic bits at the mouth of each string hole that keep the string from rubbing against the racket frame. Grommets can wear out over time, which can lead to premature string breakage and increased wear on the racquet. Signs that you might need new grommets include splintering, flaring, or rattling. The bumper guard protects the structural integrity of the raquet, preventing premature breakage.
The cost to replace the grommets and head guard is usually around $30 ($10 for labor and around $20 for a new set of grommets). Please note that grommets can only be replaced without the string, so it will require a new string job as well. Also note that it takes a few weeks for a replacement grommet set to arrive after ordering.
